required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Bioequivalence Test of DA-1229_01(A) at Fed State
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Open Label, Single Oral Administration at Fed State, 2 x 2 Crossover Study to Investigate the Bioequivalence Test of DA-1229_01(A)

brief_summary.textblock: A study demonstrates the bioequivalence of DA-1229_01(A) at Fed State when compared with Sugamet sustained-release(SR) Tab 5/1000mg® in healthy adults

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum plasmaconcentration of drug in plasma(Cmax)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity(AUCinf)
Time to reach the maximum plasma concentration(Tmax)

arm_group.description: Period 1: Single oral administration of 1 tablet of test drug(DA-1229_01(A)) together with 150 mL of water containing 30 g sugar. The wash-out for fed study is 7 days. Period 2: Single oral administration of 1 tablet of reference drug(Sugamet SR Tab 5/1000mg®) together with 150 mL of water containing 30 g sugar.

Period 1: Single oral administration of 1 tablet of reference drug(Sugamet SR Tab 5/1000mg®) together with 150 mL of water containing 30 g sugar. The wash-out for fed study is 7 days. Period 2: Single oral administration of 1 tablet of test drug(DA-1229_01(A)) together with 150 mL of water containing 30 g sugar.

intervention.description: Period 1: Single oral administration of 1 tablet of test drug(DA-1229_01(A)) together with 150 mL of water containing 30 g sugar. The wash-out for fed study is 7 days. Period 2: Single oral administration of 1 tablet of reference drug(Sugamet SR Tab 5/1000mg®) together with 150 mL of water containing 30 g sugar.

Period 1: Single oral administration of 1 tablet of reference drug(Sugamet SR Tab 5/1000mg®) together with 150 mL of water containing 30 g sugar. The wash-out for fed study is 7 days. Period 2: Single oral administration of 1 tablet of test drug(DA-1229_01(A)) together with 150 mL of water containing 30 g sugar.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients over 19 years of age at the time of health examination
- Female patients who were confirmed to be not pregnant at health examination
- Patients without a history of mental illness in the past 5 years
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who have taken medications which could affect the results of the clinical trial in the past 10 days of participating in the clinical trial
- Patients with a congestive heart failure which requires medicinal treatment
- Patients who have made a whole blood donation in the past 2 months or an apheresis donation in the past 2 weeks of participating in the clinical trial
- Female patients who are lactating
